answers.answer: Any other labs drawn? (B12, thyroid panel, etc.)  What is your diet like?

Thank you for your replied. my hgb is fine 15.7 and my MCV is 89 means no B12 problem and never did thyroid panel. my diat is not good, and I only eat alots of carbohydrates- rice , speghetti,  bread, peanut, honey, some meat, no excercise. Lat two days, I developed naussia. My excuse is, I don't have a time and busy with in school and intership.

Hgb 15.7 and MCV 89 means no B12 problem?  Is that what you are saying?  What are the Lymphocyte and Neutrophil levels?  No basic metabolic panel(BMP), especially glucose done?  I think you might have metabolic issue and stress isn't helping it.

I would definately have a blood test for thyroid, making sure its FREET3.FREET4,TSH.Also at the same time get a test for diabetes.Are you running a slight grade fever with all off this, maybe check temperature to see if you have a low grade fever, there is a possibility you may have.Have you been tested for the epstein barr virus, which is glandular fever?Low vitamin D is seen in a lot of people with thyroid issues too.With the burning issues check for vitamin B12 too.Keep me postedGood luckNicola

question: I was not feeling well since Fab 05, 2010, and body aches all over, burning sensation, fatigue, My doc told me that my Vit D is 19.7 low and range should be (30-80ng). He put me on 50,000IU once a week for 3 months. I have already taken 6 weeks and getting better, but I still have other symptoms, dry skin, tired, no energy, weight lost around my neck and shoulder; slow memory, I am very sensetive to cold. By the way, physical check, my doc seen soft tissue tumor on my stomach, but he told me not to worry. My  White blood cells is 4.9,(4-11)  but my blood differential I have lymphocytes which is high and low netrophills. I do not have headache, fever, lumps, swellon lymph. I am gradtuating within two weeks for my 4 year degree. frustrated and do not know where to start. Does anyone help me what my syptoms look like?
title: confused and Vit D is low
